channel.title: Deleted files in postgres-data/base
channel.description:
We have accidentally deleted a few files in postgres-data/base which has resulted in the following error in a few of our tables while querying results: 'Error running query: unknown error occurred. Please try again later'
Is there a way to revert back or solve the issue. It has halted our operations

item.title: Deleted files in postgres-data/base
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
I’m sorry to hear that. No, Redash doesn’t automatically snapshot the database. I hope you’ve been making periodic backups to which you can restore.

Under typical usage, nobody should be accessing the folder containing Postgres data, much less modifying it.

Read full topic
